summary: When delusional madman Roxor kidnaps a scientist in hopes of using his death ray to achieve world dominance, he is opposed by Chandu, a powerful hypnotist and yogi.
cast: Edmund Lowe|Irene Ware|Bela Lugosi|Herbert Mundin|Henry B. Walthall|Weldon Heyburn|June Lang|Michael Stuart|Virginia Hammond|Nigel De Brulier|Jimmy Dime|John George|Constantine Romanoff|Charles Stevens|Dick Sutherland
director: Directors: William Cameron Menzies (as William C. Menzies), Marcel Varnel
